thelastpromise
Class SaveLoad

java.lang.Object
  thelastpromise.SaveLoad

public class SaveLoad
extends java.lang.Object

This SaveLoad class receives the user's password and username. And places them to the Logins.txt. It encripts them to the txt file so that mis-use does not occur.
